PluginData.Author: Pas2704
PluginData.Tooltip: Adds terminal controls to show the radius of ship tools.
PluginData.Description: Adds terminal controls to show the radius of ship tools. The radius color changes based on whether the tool is idle, active, or incomplete. The keybind 'Alt + =' will toggle between showing normal and right-click drill radius. You can use '/th clear' to quickly disable the visuals without going through the terminal. There is also '/th toggle drills' as an alternative way to switch between showing normal and right-click drill radius.
